snippet: Did this “cereal milk” start-up target the wrong market? Should small businesses have to offer health insurance to part-time workers? The ultimate list of start-up competitions, hackathons, business-plan contests and more.
abstract: Did this “cereal milk” start-up target the wrong market? Should small businesses have to offer health insurance to part-time workers? The ultimate list of start-up competitions, hackathons, business-plan contests and more.

headline.main: Today in Small Business: Avoiding Bad Yelp Reviews
